welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Milan, the fashion and design capital of Italy! We hope you enjoy the city's charming blend of history, art, and modernity. Take the time to explore and savor all that Milan has to offer."

restaurants.name: Cartadazucchero
restaurants.description: Cartadazucchero is a café located in Milano.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, mainly used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, mainly serving low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a free registration is required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.
